Name: Apricot Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This light scarlet classic cocktail combines gin, apricot and lemon juice. The aromatic bitters and lemon zest twist are essential to its balance.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Stanley M. Jones' 1977 Jones' Complete Barguide .
Nutrition: One serving of Apricot Cocktail contains 148 calories
